cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on July 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5752, Emergency Relief for Servicemembers Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 189 (Wednesday, October 27, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LEVIN of California:
H.R. 5752.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H5959]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Emergency Relief for Servicemembers Act
